item.title: Lead by Example
item.description: Written by Gavin Palmer practicing a relationship with the Greatest Intentions give your attention in ways which facilitate cooperation share links to your serious writings when engaging people on the internet provide a path by which people can respond with links to their serious writings track the books you read, take notes, and share them
